title: Hour 3 - David Shaw (05-08-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - David Shaw (05-08-20)
description:
Stanford Head Football Coach David Shaw tells Dan that the big difference between college and Pro is that the pros are dealing with player unions where as in college you are dealing with college students and their parents. Coach Shaw says the state and local governments will have a lot to say about the intergration of fans and college football.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
